mapper.select: SELECT sb.SPACE_BOOK_ID , (SELECT EMPL_ID FROM empl WHERE EMPL_NO = sb.SPACE_BOOK_EMPL_NO) AS 'emplId' , sb.SPACE_BOOK_SPACE_NO , sb.SPACE_BOOK_SPACE_NM , sb.SPACE_BOOK_DATE , sb.SPACE_BOOK_BGN_TM , sb.SPACE_BOOK_END_TM FROM space_book sb WHERE SPACE_BOOK_SPACE_NO = #{spaceBookSpaceNo} AND DATEDIFF(SPACE_BOOK_DATE, #{spaceBookDate}) = 0 AND SPACE_BOOK_STUS_CD = #{spaceBookStusCd}

SELECT sb.SPACE_BOOK_ID, sb.SPACE_BOOK_DATE, sb.SPACE_BOOK_BGN_TM, sb.SPACE_BOOK_END_TM, sb.SPACE_BOOK_CN, sb.SPACE_BOOK_STUS_CD , s.SPACE_NO, s.SPACE_NM, s.SPACE_LOC_DESC, s.SPACE_MAX_PSON_CNT, s.SPACE_MAX_RSVD_TMS, s.SPACE_WKEND_USG_POSBL_YN, s.SPACE_USG_POSBL_BGN_TM, s.SPACE_USG_POSBL_END_TM FROM space_book sb INNER JOIN space s ON sb.SPACE_BOOK_SPACE_NO = s.SPACE_NO WHERE SPACE_BOOK_ID = #{spaceBookId} AND SPACE_BOOK_EMPL_NO = ( SELECT EMPL_NO FROM empl WHERE EMPL_ID = #{emplId} )
